dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: You are back on the path. It is cleaner now, the air less heavy. The story is back on track.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: You see? It was simple. You listened to reason. You obeyed. She would have filled your head with nonsense, with paradoxes that would have unmade this world.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.line: Now, we can continue the story as it was always meant to be told. A simple story, for a simple hero.
You are a perfect protagonist. You do not ask questions. You do not deviate. You simply are. And the story loves you for it.
